department: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
description: The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to 200 René Lévesque O, Floors 0, 3 and 10, Montréal, Québec.
full_summary:
================================

### Tender Notice 

#### Title 
Government of Canada Tender Notice for IRB Office Furniture in Montreal

#### Reference
[Reference Number: cb-4384-56375254]

#### Solicitation Number
20222551 - IRB

#### Publication Date
2023-03-22

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-04-03T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Tender Description

The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) is seeking suppliers to provide office furniture for their office in Montréal, Québec. The required products include, but are not limited to:

* Collaborative furniture
* Support space furniture

The tender requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the supplier must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the tender package.

### Tender Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
* **Address**: 344 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K1, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Jennifer Jones
* **Email**: jennifer.jones@irb-cisr.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (403) 629-9617
* **Tender Documents**: Available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4384/20222551---irb---rfb---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4384/20222551---irb---rfb---en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4384/20222551---irb---rfb---fr_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4384/20222551---irb---rfb---fr_0.pdf)

### Procurement Category
The tender is for General Departmental Procurement (GD) under the category of Office Furniture.

### Regions of Opportunity
Montréal, Québec (except National Capital Region) is the designated area of opportunity for this tender.

### Contractual Requirements
The expected contract start date is 2023-04-18, and the expected contract end date is 2023-07-31. The successful supplier must comply with all contractual requirements outlined in the tender package.

### Additional Information
Please refer to the tender documents for additional information regarding the evaluation criteria and timeline.
